alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 23 at 2:32PM CST until December 24 at 6:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The Department of Transportation shows that roads are not greatly impacted by blowing snow, but you should be on the lookout for isolated areas of blowing snow tonight.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
